## ForwardRequestMessage type

Forward Request Message that's used for gasless transaction

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ForwardRequestMessage = {
  from: string;
  to: string;
  value: string;
  gas: string;
  nonce: string;
  data: BytesLike;
  chainid?: string;
};
```
